main event: A witness observed a strange object about 60-70 feet in diameter hovering for a few minutes before taking off at a tremendous speed.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at about 7:25 PM,The object initially appeared to be a plane or helicopter but was later identified as something unusual,The object had a diameter of 60-70 feet,The radar operator initially thought the radar return was a small aircraft, but the characteristics suggested it was probably a balloon,The sighting lasted for 30 seconds according to radar records.
sighted object: strange object approximately 60-70 feet in diameter
witness description: A person looking out of a picture window
